review: Just as good as the Fire TV and faster than Apple TV!
author: Patrick Fenoughty

review: Does what it's supposed to do. Haven't figured out yet how to bring Google pages up from my laptop. Anyone know?
author: Reader700

review: great for my home office. easy set up. love the home screen. Just wish it had TWC app, then it would be prefect
author: Layasgrand

review: Fantastic, much faster than a smart tv.
author: T. Jackson

review: I love it. It was very simple to set up and it works great!
author: Sandra Jordan

review: How can you not love this?  If you are a Prime member, you have to get this.  It is extremely easy to set up.  Beyond easy.  So much content available its ridiculous.  I bought a 2nd one for a bedroom TV.
author: JW

review: It was easy to install and very quickly done. I had more trouble moving the entertainment center to plug in the power cord than getting this set up. I enjoy being able to watch movies from Netflix on my television now instead of huddling around my computer or Kindle. I have considered taking this with me on a trip, but I'm not as sure of the Wifi in the hotel as I am at home. But that is not the problem with the Fire TV stick and is the problem with the hotel. Still, I am enjoying this alot!
author: Rocky Oberlin "rachel_oberlin"

review: I love having the Amazon Fire Stick - cancelled HBO, signed up for Netflix and have a whole new world of viewing options.  So simple to set up I was able to do it myself.
author: Amazon Customer
